pages.text:
Membership Categories
Attractive Memberships To Fit Your Lifestyle
LPGA offers a variety of memberships, all with no food and beverage minimums plus no assessments guaranteed. Memberships include equal privileges for spouse/domestic partner and unmarried children under the age of 23 living at home. Below are the membership categories offered:
Full Golf Family
Full Golf Family Members enjoy all of LPGA International's first-class amenities including 36-holes of championship golf designed by Arthur Hills and Rees Jones, a 3-hole championship practice course, tour-quality practice facilities with unlimited range balls, state-of-the-art fitness center with personal trainers, swimming, beautiful clubhouse with great dining and social events plus members receive discounts on all food, beverages and golf shop merchandise as well as complimentary room rental for all private events.
Full Golf Single
Full Golf Single Members enjoy all of the same member benefits as Full Golf Family Members excluding Fitness which is an optional add-on for $15 monthly.
Young Executive Golf
(40 years & under)
Young Executive Golf Members enjoy all of the same member benefits as Full Golf Family Members excluding Fitness which is an optional add-on for $15 monthly.
Seasonal Golf Memberships
Seasonal Family, Single and Young Executive Golf Memberships are available. Please contact Membership Sales for details.
Social Membership
Social Members enjoy LPGA International's first-class amenities including a beautiful clubhouse with great dining and social events plus discounts on all food, beverages and golf shop merchandise as well as complimentary room rental for all private events. Social Members have privileges to use the pool facilities and locker rooms as well as receive discounted rates on golf.
Social Athletic Membership
Social Athletic Members enjoy all of the same member benefits as Social Members plus unlimited use of the private Fitness Center which is open to Members and their Guests
7 days a week. The s
tate-of-the-art cardio and strength training equipment is provided by Life Fitness with personal trainers and group training available. The Fitness Center also features a Snack Bar stocked with protein and recovery items.
Social Range Membership
Social Range Members enjoy all of the same member benefits as Social Members plus unlimited use of the range and short game areas.
Social Athletic Range Membership
Social Athletic Range Members enjoy all of the same member benefits as Social Members plus unlimited use of the private Fitness Center, range and short game areas.
Watch LPGA Members-Only Wine Dinner Video - Compliments of
Meghaphone Marketing
For more information and to schedule a tour, please contact:
Membership Sales
386.523.2020
[email protected]

Membership Information
JOIN THE PREMIER GOLF CLUB OF DAYTONA  BEACH
Join LPGA International and enjoy 36 holes of world-class golf designed by Arthur Hills and Rees Jones, 4-Star rated by Golf Digest. The tour-quality practice facility features a double-ended range, a Rees Jones designed 3-hole championship practice course, short game areas and putting greens. In addition to golf, the Club offers an array of first-class amenities including the state-of-the-art fitness center, swimming complex, dining at Malcolm’s Bar & Grill, full service Men’s and Women’s Golf Shop and beautiful private event, dining and relaxation space throughout our 18,000-square-foot clubhouse. Our traditions of excellent service, a friendly staff and outstanding amenities combine to create relationships that last a lifetime.
Special Limited Time Membership Offering - Call for Details
AFFORDABLE GOLF, SOCIAL AND SEASONAL MEMBERSHIPS
No Food & Beverage Minimums   No Assessments
LPGA International Member Privileges include:
Access to the Arthur Hills and Rees Jones Championship Courses
Access to 3-Hole Championship Practice Course
Unlimited Use of Range and Short Game Areas
Complimentary Carts After 3pm for Evening Golf
Member Charging Privileges
Complimentary GHIN Handicap Service
10% Discount on All Food and Beverages
10% Discount on All Golf Shop Merchandise
20% Discount on Guest Fees
Golf Merchandise Special Orders Cost + 10%
Use of Pool Facilities and Member Locker Rooms
Member Appreciation Days and Events
Annual Calendar of Social Events
Complimentary Room Rental Fees for All Private Events
Tee Times Available 30 Days in Advance
Member Cart Fees: Championship Courses $19, 3-Hole Championship Practice Course $7
The Club offers a wide range of membership options including Golf, Social, Seasonal and Young Professional.
Click Here to View LPGA International Membership Categories
Join LPGA International Today
We invite you to visit the Club and experience the benefits of membership firsthand. To schedule a tour and learn more about LPGA International's attractive memberships, please contact:
Membership Sales

Weddings & Bridal Events
Celebrate your Big Day at LPGA
Your wedding should be as special as the love you are celebrating. Centrally located in Daytona Beach, LPGA International is the perfect venue for your wedding ceremony and reception. From breathtaking views to fantastic cuisine, our experienced Private Event Director and services staff will assist you in designing your special day.
Having your ceremony at LPGA International is effortless. Private bridal and groom suites are available before and after the ceremony. Beverages and hors d'oeuvres can be served to the bridal party as they relax and prepare for the big event. Your guests can easily migrate from your poolside ceremony location to the lounge or veranda for the cocktail hour. The club offers beautiful full-service private event rooms, which will accommodate up to 170 guests, as well as a variety of amenities to make your ceremony and reception complete.
Whether you are planning a bridal shower for 30 or a wedding for 150 guests, our staff creates magic moments for you and your guests, while placing emphasis on fine food and impeccable creativity and service. LPGA's staff is experienced in hosting a wide range of bridal events including:
Bridal Showers
Luncheons
Bachelor Golf Outings
Rehearsal Dinners
Wedding Receptions
Post Wedding Brunches
Anniversary Celebrations
LPGA International provides a wide range of all-inclusive wedding packages simplifying the planning process for you. We take pride in delivering excellence to our clients at an affordable price and will work with you to create the perfect package that fits your needs and budget.
Let us create the perfect blend of sophistication, elegance and warmth to match your personality and style.
Watch LPGA Wedding Video - Compliments of
Meghaphone Marketing
For more information or to schedule a tour, please contact:
Tara Ann Iuteri - 386.523.2044
[email protected]
You do not have to be a Member to host your bridal event at the Club.
Click Here to Request Bridal Event Information

Special Events & Meetings
The Perfect Venue for All of Your Special Events
Whether you are planning a charity fundraiser, corporate meeting or birthday celebration, LPGA is the premier event venue in Daytona Beach.
Located just minutes from the beaches and conveniently off I-95, the prestigious LPGA Clubhouse features the main ballroom which accommodates up to 170 guests and an adjacent outdoor veranda with scenic views. For smaller events, an array of full-service private rooms are available.
LPGA International offers affordable, all-inclusive meeting and event packages with personalized menus for any size budget. From continental breakfasts, brunch or lunch buffets to all occasion cocktail hours to formal sit-down dinners. Our culinary team can prepare a wide range of menu selections including hors d'oeuvres, carving stations, buffets, sit-down dinners and fantastic desserts.
If you are planning a corporate function, LPGA has the space necessary to accommodate your group. Breakfast, lunch or dinner meetings are available.
Meeting amenities include:
Theatre-Style, Classroom-Style & Round-Table Meeting Rooms
Wi-Fi throughout the Clubhouse
A/V Equipment Available
Breakout Rooms
Buffet, Plated or Boxed Lunch Options
Reward Your Team – Play Golf Afterwards
LPGA International's first-class amenities, delicious cuisine, along with our professional staff will ensure that your event is sure to be both memorable and successful. All you have to do is show up – leave the details to us!
For more information or to schedule a tour, please contact:
Tara Ann Iuteri - Special Events & Weddings Sales
386.523.2044
[email protected]
You do not have to be a Member to host your bridal event at the Club.
Click Here to Request Event Information
